item.title: Second‐line treatment for acute graft‐versus‐host disease with mesenchymal stromal cells: A decision model.
item.description: In this article we describe the development and simulation of a decision model for the second-line treatment of acute GvHD.

item.title: Obinutuzumab in Combination with Chemotherapy for the First-Line Treatment of Patients with Advanced Follicular Lymphoma: An Evidence Review Group Evaluation of the NICE Single Technology Appraisal
item.description: An Evidence Review Group Evaluation of the NICE Single Technology Appraisal for obinutuzumab in combination with chemotherapy for first-line treatment of advanced follicular lymphoma.

item.title: How to prepare a systematic review of economic evaluations for clinical practice guidelines: database selection and search strategy development (part 2/3)
item.description: A short paper on how to prepare a systematic literature review of economic evaluations.
